meanings.sent1: After the break, they decided to reengage in the project.
meanings.sent2: She reengaged with her old hobby of painting.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to reengage with the laser pointer, but it was out of batteries.
meanings.sent4: His reengagement with the community brought new energy to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The reengagement of the students in the lesson was evident from their participation.

meanings.sent1: The reengagement of the team led to increased productivity.
meanings.sent2: Her reengagement with the book club brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent3: The reengagement of the audience after the intermission was enthusiastic.
meanings.sent4: The reengagement of the customers with the brand was a marketing success.
meanings.sent5: The reengagement of the students in the school activities was heartwarming.
